ready-made.translation[0].definitions[0]: ready-made food or goods are already prepared or made, and ready for you to use immediately
ready-made.translation[0].definitions[1]: ready-made ideas or reasons are provided for you, so that you do not have to think of them yourself
The rain gave us a ready-made excuse to stay at home.
ready-made.translation[1].definitions[0]: already prepared, and ready to be used immediately
The company produces canned soup and ready-made meals.
ready-made.translation[1].definitions[1]: clothes etc that have been manufactured in large quantities, rather than made for a particular customer
